author: Joshua Barrie
title: Nicole Kidman's 'weird' clapping at the Oscars is confusing everyone - Mirror Online
text:
Nicole Kidman's 'weird' clapping at the Oscars is confusing everyone Some critics have likened her clapping to that of a seal Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Nicole Kidman's bizarre Oscars clapping Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Nicole Kidman has a weird clap. Or, at least, she did at the Oscars. 
A lot of people have been talking about that mix-up – you know, the most embarrassing gaff in the history of the Academy Awards. What a mess. 
But don't let the issue with the envelope distract you from the real Oscars drama – Australian actress Nicole Kidman, whose hands look as if they're about to take-off at any moment. What is going on? Nicole Kidman, not clapping (Photo: Getty) Read More 
Now fine, the camera angle is definitely having an effect. Looking up at Kidman elongates her hands. And it's also worth noting that she's a tall and slender, hands included. Here she goes 
But also, she claps weirdly. There's just no getting away from it. People are upset. Like us on Facebook
